price: Sεdeε (Nyankopͻn) bɛbisa nokwafoͻ no wͻn nokorεdie ho asεm. Nyankopͻn asiesie asotwee a εyε ya paa ato boniayεfoͻ no hͻ.
arabic: لِّيَسۡـَٔلَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ عَن صِدۡقِهِمۡۚ وَأَعَدَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: liyasala al-ṣādiqīna ʿan ṣid'qihim wa-aʿadda lil'kāfirīna ʿadhāban alīman
